Recipe.Description: Chocolate ganache is the silky glaze poured over confectioneries like cakes, pastries, brownies and truffles. It serves a dual purpose, enhancing the presentation of the food by giving it a glass-like sheen and imparting a creamy mouthfeel to desserts. Despite its sophisticated appearance, chocolate ganache is remarkably easy to make from equal parts of chocolate and heavy cream.
